#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {

	int t,n,num4,num;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		num=n-n%7;
		if(n<7)
		{
			if(n%4==0)
				num4=0;
			else 
				num4=-1;
		}
		else
		{
			if(n%7==0)
				num4=n;
			else
			{
				while(num>=7)
					{
						if(((n-num)%4)==0)
						{	
							num4=num;
							break;
						}
						num=num-7;
					}
				}	
						
			}
		cout<<num4<<"\n";
	}
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
